sentence.Network_en: This luxurious talcum lotion restores softness and suppleness to dehydrated skin.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种奢侈的滑石润肤露能使缺水的皮肤恢复柔软与弹性。

sentence.Network_en: Dehydrated meals, soups and sauces contain a lot of salt.
sentence.Network_cn: 脱水后的饭菜、汤和调味料中含有很多盐分。

sentence.Network_en: Alcohol acts as a diuretic, making you even more dehydrated.
sentence.Network_cn: 酒起着利尿剂的作用，会使你更加脱水。

entry.tran: (常指为便于保存而）使(食品等)脱水，使干燥
entry.def: When something such as food is dehydrated, all the water is removed from it, often in order to preserve it.

example.ex: Normally specimens have to be dehydrated.
example.tran: 标本通常需要经过干燥处理。

entry.def: If you dehydrate or if something dehydrates you, you lose too much water from your body so that you feel weak or ill.

example.ex: People can dehydrate in weather like this...
example.tran: 人们在这样的天气下可能会脱水。
酒精会让身体迅速脱水。

means.word_mean: 1. suffering from excessive loss of water from the body;
